showScoreExcerpt:
Playwright Jocelyn Bioh expands on the concept of Black style in the show, celebrating individuality and woman entrepreneurship while also exploring immigration and the African diaspora in America. The show is lovingly directed by Whitney White, balancing uproarious comedy and wit with sincerity and grace.

Read more
